languages.text: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] If an ally under the wielder`s Bring It Down! {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy with any attack or affect with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wielder gains +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy affected or hit.

If an ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

languages.text: 当盟友受到装备者把它干掉！能力{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响时，若此盟友成功{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人，或此盟友使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响敌人，则每当该盟友命中或影响一名新的敌人，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: If an ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: 当盟友受到装备者把它干掉！能力{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响时，若此盟友成功{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人，或此盟友使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响敌人，则每当该盟友命中或影响一名新的敌人，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 着用者の打ち倒せ！アビリティの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}下にある味方が攻撃で敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させるかその敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとすることに成功した場合、その着用者は戦闘終了時まで、命中した異なる敵または異なるターゲットごとに、 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を1得る。
languages.original_text: If an ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: 着用者の打ち倒せ！アビリティの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}下にある味方が攻撃で敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させるかその敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとすることに成功した場合、その着用者は戦闘終了時まで、命中した異なる敵または異なるターゲットごとに、 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}を1得る。

languages.text: Si cualquier aliado bajo los efectos de la capacidad ¡Derribadlo! del portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un ataque o dirige una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} contra él, el portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate por cada enemigo alcanzado o elegido como objetivo.
languages.original_text: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: Si cualquier aliado bajo los {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efectos{/g} de la capacidad ¡Derribadlo! del portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un ataque o dirige una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} contra él, el portador gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate por cada enemigo alcanzado o elegido como objetivo.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter, der unter dem Effekt der Fähigkeit Bring es zu Ende! des Trägers steht, einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} oder ihn mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden Feind, der getroffen oder anvisiert wurde, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Verbündeter, der unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} der Fähigkeit Bring es zu Ende! des Trägers steht, einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g} oder ihn mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erlangt der Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden unterschiedlichen Feind, der getroffen oder anvisiert wurde, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.

languages.text: Когда союзник под действием способности персонажа Особое поручение совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по цели или применяет к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} за каждую отдельную цель союзника до конца боя.
languages.original_text: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник под действием способности персонажа Особое поручение совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по цели или применяет к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} за каждую отдельную цель союзника до конца боя.

Когда союзник под действием способности персонажа Особое поручение совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по цели или применяет к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} за каждую отдельную цель союзника до конца боя.

languages.text: Si un allié sous l'effet de la capacité Descendez-le ! de l'utilisateur réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} un ennemi avec une attaque ou à le cibler avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat pour chaque autre ennemi touché ou ciblé.
languages.original_text: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

traits.locale_text: Si un allié sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de la capacité Descendez-Le ! de l'utilisateur réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}toucher{/g} un ennemi avec une attaque ou à le cibler avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat pour chaque autre ennemi touché ou ciblé.
